question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: Sur quelles rives se trouve le centre d'Uppsala, en Suède ?
answer: Le centre d'Uppsala se trouve sur les rives de la rivière Fyrisån.
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala lies on the banks of the river Fyrisån.
